comment: Main text block containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, enclosed by a thick black border. The text includes large characters (e.g., '丙', '丁') followed by smaller explanatory or phonetic annotations. The layout follows traditional right-to-left, top-to-bottom reading order. There are also marginal notes on the right side, including numbers like '小二百二十二' and '言文十四'. The bottom-right corner has the name '嚴華', possibly indicating the publisher or scribe.
